channel.title: Specana V1 (Old Source)
channel.description:
[b]I am FusionBird on Rune-server (startdafunk@hotmail.com)[/b]
[CENTER][IMG]http://img512.imageshack.us/img512/5387/specanalogotz8.png[/img][/CENTER]
[COLOR="Red"]There is no Virus Scan because I have not included an virus in it. You can check your self. But I did not include any virus inside. It is just pure java and class files.[/COLOR]
Hello, I made a server called Specana. I used RicScapes v5 server and i massivly coded it. I made it Compatable with my client but i wont release my client since i Have too slow internet to upload 18 megabytes. Please edit everything. Ok Lets Start introducing Specana.
[SIZE="7"]Please do not leech this server.[/SIZE]
[ul][*][B][U]Specana's Server Features:[/U][/B] [*]Its got a Pk Island [*]It has its own premade bank created by FusionBird [*]A New Welcome Menu [*]No Membership [*]Fixed all bugs. [*]Starting Home = Taverly [*]Mining requires a pickaxe[/ul]
In-Game Screenshots:
[IMG]http://img520.imageshack.us/img520/8271/pic1eb1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://img404.imageshack.us/img404/7558/pic2vv3.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://img404.imageshack.us/img404/184/pic3sw6.jpg[/img]
Download Links:
[COLOR="SeaGreen"]Please post your download links if you would like it to be listed here[/COLOR]
[CODE]http://files.filefront.com/Specana+Serverrar/;12200212;/fileinfo.html[/CODE] [CODE]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=20AOR1X7[/CODE]
